question: Which state CM forms 'Maa' committee to keep an eye on mid-day meals served to students?
explanation: Uttar Pradesh CM Yogi Adityanath has decided to form 'Maa' committees to keep an eye on mid-day meals served to students in state-run primary schools. It will be a committee of six mothers, from all sections of society, whose students are studying in that school. It's a Mother's Day gift for lakhs of children and their moms in Uttar Pradesh.
